verbs.description: The French president [V: has] built a credible platform to lead on Syria . Trump should let him .
[ARG0: The French president] has [V: built] [ARG1: a credible platform to lead on Syria] . Trump should let him .
The French president has built a credible platform to [V: lead] [ARG1: on Syria] . Trump should let him .
The French president has built a credible platform to lead on Syria . Trump [V: should] let him .
The French president has built a credible platform to lead on Syria . [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: should] [V: let] [ARG1: him] .
